title: CarmeMiquel.com
subtitle: Design and development of a writers website
excerpt: Design and development of the official website for the valencian writer Carme Miquel.

description.text: Official website for the valencian writer Carme Miquel. This site contains information about the author and her published books as well as some interviews, a vast collection of her weekly opinion columns published in the Levante EMV newspaper, and promotional videos of some of her books.
All the content is managed with a single Wordpress instance with multiple custom post types and taxonomies.
